medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over red chalk on laid paper
title: A Bolognese City Square with Tradesmen
description: mounted to ivory paper; off-white over mat with gold and brown borders; enclosed courtyard/city square with tall curved wall with arches in distance; buildings at right and left; man shoeing a horse in foreground, LRC; figure on bucking horse at center; other figures along edges of square; tiny, neat inscriptions scattered throughout
